resources.string: The debut Season for New World!
Mysteries will be uncovered and blood will be spilled, in the second Season for New World!
Season 3: Rise of the Angry Earth
Return to First Light and face the newly rising threat, in the third Season for New World!
Complete {count} Objectives from Chapter {chapter} and Claim Chapter {prevChapter} Reward
You must be level {minlevel} to access Seasons
Seasons Consumable Tokens are currently disabled
Unlocks access to the Seasons Rewards Track

How does the Season Journey work?

Do You Want A New Card?

Unable to process New Card transaction. Please try again later.
Select any <font color="#ffea00">HIGHLIGHTED SQUARE</font> to <font color="#ffea00">STAMP</font> the Card.
Stamp at least {count} squares to be able to finish the current Card.
Complete Activities to earn stamps on the card.
Select a highlighted square to stamp the card and earn Season XP.
Stamp lines on the card to earn additional Season XP.
Complete enough stamps to finish a card and earn a new one.
Obtain one wild stamp daily or by completing lines of four stamps on the activity card.
In exchange for Azoth, you may reroll the Activities list to get new ones. Any progress toward unstamped Activites will be lost.
Each new card comes with 1 free reroll.
The cost of rerolling increases with each use.
Reroll costs reset with each new card.
Complete Chapters and Challenges to earn Season XP and claim rewards.
Chapters and Challenges feature unique objectives to accomplish during the season.
Complete an objective to claim its reward.
Claim rewards to earn progress towards a Chapter's goal.
Reach the goal in each Chapter to unlock that Chapter's reward.
Each Chapter has a completion goal.
Claim enough objectives to reach the goal.
Unlock the Chapter reward when its goal is reached.

Rerolling is disabled while in Cross World Instances.
Item claiming is disabled in Cross World Instances and only available from your Home World.
Task claiming is disabled inside Cross World Instances and only available from your Home World.

Purchasing the Premium Season Pass is disabled in Cross World Instances.
